sentences.en: Cordelia and Ophelia orbit inside the synchronous orbit radius.
sentences.cn: 天卫六与天卫七属于同步轨道半径之内.
科迪莉娅模仿了他那奇怪的腔调.

sentences.en: Don't grudge Anne Cordelia her fancies, Diana. I'm always sorry for children who don't spend a few years in fairyland.
sentences.cn: 不要对安妮.科迪莉亚的想象力不满，戴安娜，我总是为没有在童话世界中度过一段岁月的孩子感到遗憾。

sentences.en: How, how , Cordelia ! Mend your speech a little lest you may mar your fortunes.
sentences.cn: 李尔修正修正你的言辞,否则会毁坏你的命运的.

trans.tran_cn: [女子名] 科迪莉亚来源于凯尔特语及日耳曼语，含义是“海的女儿，心”(sea daughter,heart)
